msg: The client library has a dependency on jdom.

author: masonjm
msg: - No longer uses a single connection. When a hung LDAP server recovers Slide will now recover as well.

author: masonjm
msg: - Now creates a new connection for each LDAP access. This prevents an error in the LDAP server from bring Slide down.
